metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: •  Serve immediately.        Cottage Cheese and Veggie Bowl  Ingredients:  •  1 cup cottage cheese  •  1/4 cup diced cucumber  •  1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved  •  1/4 cup diced bell pepper  •  Salt and pepper to taste  Instructions:  •  In a bowl, combine cottage cheese, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and bell pepper.  •  Season with salt and pepper.  •  Serve immediately.          Almond Butter and Apple Slices  Ingredients:  •  1 apple, sliced  •  2 tablespoons almond butter  Instructions:  •...

o Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).  o Slice baguette in half lengthwise.  o Mix softened butter with minced garlic, chopped parsley, and salt.  o Spread mixture on bread.  o Bake for 10-15 minutes until golden.  o Serve warm.    Gazpacho    Ingredients:  o 4 tomatoes  o 1 cucumber  o 1 small red onion  o 1 bell pepper  o 2 cloves garlic  o 1/4 cup olive oil  o 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar  o 1 teaspoon salt  o 1/2 teaspoon pepper    Instructions:  o Dice tomatoes, cucumber, onion, and bell pep...

Quiche Lorraine  Ingredients:    1 pie crust    6 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled    1 small onion, diced    1 cup grated Gruyère cheese    3 eggs    1 cup heavy cream    1/2 teaspoon salt    1/4 teaspoon pepper  Instructions:    Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).    Place pie crust in a pie dish.    Sprinkle cooked bacon, diced onion, and grated Gruyère cheese over the crust.    In a bowl, whisk eggs, heavy cream, salt, and pepper.    Pour egg mixture over the filling.    Bake f...

  1/2 cup basil pesto    1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved    1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese    2 tablespoons olive oil    Salt and pepper to taste  Instructions:    In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat.    Add zucchini noodles and cook until tender.    Stir in basil pesto and cherry tomatoes.    Season with salt and pepper.    Sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese and serve. o Add diced tomatoes, fish stock, wine, saffron, thyme, salt, and pepper, simmer  for 20 minutes.  o Add fish fillets, shrimp, and mussels, cook until seafood is done.  o Serve hot with crusty bread.
